definitions.definition: A newly sprouted leaf or blossom that has not yet unfolded .
examples: After a long, cold winter, the trees finally began to produce buds .

definitions.definition: ( figuratively ) Something that has begun to develop .
A small rounded body in the process of splitting from an organism , which may grow into a genetically identical new organism.
examples: In this slide, you can see a yeast cell forming buds .

definitions.definition: ( usually uncountable , slang ) Potent cannabis taken from the flowering part of the plant (the "bud"), or marijuana generally.

subdefinitions.definition: ( US , Canada , Australia , slang , usually in the plural ) Cannabis that has been taken from the flowering part of the plant intended to be smoked.
( US , Canada , Australia , slang , uncountable ) Marijuana.
examples: Hey bro, want to smoke some bud ?

definitions.definition: A weaned calf in its first year , so called because the horns are then beginning to bud .
( dated , term of endearment ) A pretty young girl .

main_definition: A newly sprouted leaf or blossom that has not yet unfolded .
secondary_definitions: ( figuratively ) Something that has begun to develop .
A small rounded body in the process of splitting from an organism , which may grow into a genetically identical new organism.
( usually uncountable , slang ) Potent cannabis taken from the flowering part of the plant (the "bud"), or marijuana generally.
A weaned calf in its first year , so called because the horns are then beginning to bud .
( dated , term of endearment ) A pretty young girl .

examples: I like to hang out with my buds on Saturday night.

definitions.definition: Synonym of guy , term of address for a man or person.

secondary_definitions: ( informal , chiefly Canada ) Synonym of guy , term of address for a man or person.
